title: User Registration with Valid Data
description: Verify that a new user can successfully register using valid email and password.

steps.description: Navigate to the user registration page.
Fill in valid email, password, and required profile details.
Submit the registration form.
Registration is successful and user is redirected to login or dashboard.

title: Login with Correct Email/Password
description: Verify login is successful using correct email and password and JWT tokens are returned.

steps.description: Navigate to the login page.
Input a registered email and correct password.
Click the login button.
Login succeeds and access and refresh tokens are returned.

title: Login with Incorrect Password
description: Verify login fails when an incorrect password is provided.

steps.description: Navigate to the login page.
Input a registered email and incorrect password.
Attempt to login.
Login fails with an appropriate error message.

title: Biometric Authentication Login
description: Verify user can login through biometric authentication if enabled.

steps.description: Access biometric login option on login page.
Provide valid biometric authentication (e.g., fingerprint, face recognition).
Login succeeds with valid biometric authentication.

title: Two-Factor Authentication (2FA) Workflow
description: Verify that after login with email and password, the OTP is sent and verification allows access.

steps.description: Login with valid email and password in 2FA enabled account.
Receive OTP on registered device/email.
Submit the correct OTP for verification.
User is authenticated successfully and given access tokens.

title: Search Restaurants with Filters
description: Verify searching restaurants by keyword and filtering by cuisine and rating returns accurate results.

steps.description: Navigate to restaurant listing page.
Enter a keyword in the search bar.
Apply cuisine filter and rating filter.
Listed restaurants match search criteria and filters correctly.

title: Get Restaurant Details and Menu
description: Verify that restaurant details and menu items are correctly retrieved and displayed.

steps.description: Select a restaurant from the listing.
Request to view restaurant details and menu.
Restaurant details and menu items are accurately displayed.

title: Create New Order with Valid Data
description: Verify a user can create a new order with selected restaurant, items, delivery address, and payment method.

steps.description: Select restaurant and choose menu items.
Provide valid delivery address.
Select a payment method and confirm payment.
Submit the order.
Order is created successfully and order confirmation is received.

title: Cancel Order Before Preparation
description: Verify user can cancel an order before it enters preparation status and receives refund if applicable.

steps.description: Create a new order.
Cancel the order before it enters preparation.
Order is successfully canceled and refund is processed if payment was made.

title: Track Order Status in Real-Time
description: Verify that order status updates are received in real-time with correct status and location on the map.

steps.description: Place a new order and start tracking.
Order status updates (e.g., confirmed, preparing, out for delivery, delivered) are received promptly.
Delivery location updates are reflected correctly on the map in the frontend.

title: Payment Processing for Multiple Methods
description: Verify payments succeed using credit card, UPI, wallet balance, and cash on delivery.

steps.description: Place orders selecting each payment method respectively.
Payments are processed successfully or acknowledged for cash on delivery.

title: Wallet Balance and Refund Management
description: Verify wallet balance retrieval accuracy and that refunds update the wallet balance correctly.

steps.description: Retrieve wallet balance via API.
Trigger a refund to the wallet.
Wallet balance updates correctly reflecting the refund.

title: Delivery Rider Accepts Offer and Updates Location
description: Verify delivery rider can accept a delivery offer and update location which reflects in real-time status.

steps.description: Delivery rider views pending delivery offers.
Accept a delivery offer.
Send location updates as GPS coordinates.
Offer acceptance is recorded, and location updates are visible in order tracking.

title: Real-Time Chat Communication
description: Verify chat messages can be sent and received instantly between customers, restaurants, and delivery riders over WebSocket.

steps.description: Establish WebSocket connection to chat endpoint.
Send text message from customer to restaurant.
Message is received instantly by restaurant and acknowledged.
Reply message from restaurant to customer.
Customer receives reply instantly.

title: WebSocket Connection Stability and Reconnection
description: Verify WebSocket connections remain stable during intermittent network issues and automatically reconnect without data loss.

steps.description: Establish WebSocket chat connection.
Simulate network interruption.
WebSocket connection drops and client attempts to reconnect automatically.
Once reconnected, the chat resumes without message loss.

title: Admin Panel User Management Access Control
description: Verify that admin panel user management features are accessible only by authorized admins and user data is displayed correctly.

steps.description: Login as admin user.
Access users management page.
Admin can view, search, and manage user information.
Attempt to access admin user management as a non-admin user.
Access is denied with appropriate error.

title: System Health Status Display
description: Verify the admin panel can retrieve and display current system health status accurately.

steps.description: Navigate to system health dashboard in admin panel.
System health information such as uptime, error rates, and service status is displayed correctly.

title: Responsive Design on Multiple Devices
description: Verify frontend applications for customer, restaurant, delivery, and admin adapt layout and functionality correctly across desktop, tablet, and mobile devices.

steps.description: Open each frontend app on desktop browser.
UI elements render correctly and application is functional.
Repeat on tablet viewport sizes.
UI adapts and remains fully functional with no layout issues.
Repeat on mobile viewport sizes.
UI is responsive, readable, and functional on mobile devices.

title: API Endpoint Authentication and Input Validation
description: Verify all critical API endpoints enforce JWT authentication and validate incoming inputs to prevent malformed requests and unauthorized access.

steps.description: Attempt to access protected endpoints without authentication.
Access is denied with 401 Unauthorized response.
Send malformed or invalid data in request bodies.
API returns appropriate 400 Bad Request errors with useful messages.

title: Notification Delivery for Order and System Events
description: Verify that users receive timely notifications related to order status changes, delivery updates, and system messages through supported channels.

steps.description: Trigger order status change (e.g., order confirmed, out for delivery).
User receives notification promptly in the frontend app.
Trigger system notification (e.g., maintenance alert).
Notification is displayed correctly and in a timely manner.

title: Order History Retrieval
description: Verify that users can retrieve their past orders history accurately with details and correct status.

steps.description: Login as user with existing orders.
Request order history via API or frontend.
Complete order list with correct detail and order statuses is returned.

title: Order Status Update Propagation to Restaurant Dashboard
description: Verify that when customers place or cancel orders, restaurant dashboards receive updates with notifications correctly.

steps.description: Place a new order by customer.
Restaurant dashboard receives new order notification.
Cancel order before preparation.
Restaurant dashboard is updated with cancellation status.

title: Concurrent Order Placement Handling
description: Verify system reliably handles multiple concurrent order placements without data corruption or loss.

steps.description: Simultaneously submit multiple order creation requests from different users.
All valid orders are processed correctly without conflicts or errors.

title: Session Management and Token Refresh
description: Verify that JWT refresh token endpoint works correctly extending session and access token expiry.

steps.description: Login and obtain access and refresh tokens.
Use refresh token to request new access token.
New access token is issued and valid for subsequent API calls.

title: OAuth Login via Google/Apple/Facebook
description: Verify users can login using OAuth providers and receive JWT tokens correctly.

steps.description: Select OAuth login option (e.g., Google).
Complete OAuth authentication flow.
User is authenticated and JWT tokens are returned.
